ActivityMetadata.Name: ZM Get IM Chat Sessions
ActivityMetadata.Label: ZM Get IM Chat Sessions
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Retrieve IM Chat sessions for a specified period of time. Note: This API only supports Oauth2.
**Scopes:** `imchat:read, imchat:read:admin`
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Zoom

Get IM Chat Sessions

Retrieve IM Chat sessions for a specified period of time. Note: This API only supports Oauth2. **Scopes:** `imchat:read, imchat:read:admin`

Method: Get

OperationID: imChatSessions

EndPoint:

/im/chat/sessions
